programme.title: Dog Patrol

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Wellington dog patrol team Luke and Ice track a dodgy driver and Customs dog Yarra plays it be ear and nose, all on Dog Squad's epic 100th episode. (S11, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Estate Sale: Ashley and Les head off to a huge estate sale, Seth takes a custom Corvette go-kart for a spin and Karen eyes up a piece of `70s movie memorabilia. (S13, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Professor Les: Les gets invited to give a lecture at a local business school. Meanwhile, Ashley and Bobby J go to war over a collection of Nerf guns. (S13, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: War On The Floor: Les questions Ashley's management skills when two employees get into a fight on the shop floor. Meanwhile, Seth stumbles upon a potentially huge deal. (S13, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Secret Shopper: Les hatches a secret plan to put his employees to the test, but how will Seth, Ashley and Karen react when they find out? (S13, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Cousin Vs Cousin: When Ashley interferes with one of Karen's sales on the shop floor, a family feud breaks out. Meanwhile, a rock metal group drops by. (S13, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Seth's Big Mistake: Les finally lands a buyer for his special edition Lee Iacocca Mustang, but loses his cool when he learns Seth sent the hot rod out on consignment. (S13, ep 11)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Three Ring Circus Part 1: Karen comes up with a big idea for the shop, while Byron puts two ice hockey fans in their place when they get physical over a vintage puck. (S13, ep 12)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Three Ring Circus Part 2: It's the day of Karen's big event, but Ashley gives Les an ultimatum that could change American Jewelry and Loan forever. (S13, ep 13)

programme.title: Container Wars
programme.desc: Damage Control: A battered container leads to high tension and a major find yields big bucks. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Bubba And The Chocolate Factory: The buyers head to the affluent town of Las Colinas, where they hope that mega mansions spell luxury lockers. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 94/95
programme.desc: United Archives 29/10/94. The Reds took on Kevin Keegan's tabling-topping Newcastle looking for a revenge after the Magpies had dumped them out of the League Cup just 3 days earlier.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 27/12/95. United were 10 points behind Kevin Keegan's Newcastle at the top of the Premiership when the Magpies came to Old Trafford for this Christmas cracker.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 95/96
programme.desc: United Archives 4/3/96. The Reds faced a crunch game in the title race as they sought to overhaul Newcastle, victory would close the gap to just one point with nine games to go.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 97/98
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/97. The Reds were sitting a point clear at the top of the table ahead of a Christmas cracker against second-placed Newcastle.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 98/99
programme.desc: United Archives: Andy Cole scores a brace against his former club to maintain the Reds' advantage at the top of the table.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 20/8/00. United take on Bobby Robson's Magpies on the opening day of the 2000-01 season.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 02/03
programme.desc: United Archives 23/11/02. Ruud Van Nistelrooy makes the headlines in this game full of goals.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 12/1/08. The Reds took on Newcastle on what was to be a memorable evening for Cristiano Ronaldo. This was the night that he scored his one and only hat-trick for United.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 16/8/10. After losing out on the Premier League title to Chelsea, the Reds kicked off the new season by welcoming newly-promoted Newcastle to Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 26/11/11. The Reds desperately needed a win to keep pace with Manchester City at the top of the table.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 7/10/12. United travelled to St James' Park desperate to erase the memory of last season's 3-0 defeat at the hands of the Magpies.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Erase Your Head: Gwen orders a personality modifying ray to tone her perky parents, but decides to test it on the class first. (S3 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Teacher, Soldier, Chef, Spy: When Beth, Duncan and Izzy break Chef's new VR helmet they have to recreate his game world to keep him from ever finding out the truth. (S3 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Thingameroo: When a lack of motivation threatens to sink the kids' chances in the Sportslete Athlaction Awards, they create the greatest mascot of all time to boost school spirit. (S3 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: CodE.T.: When Cody gets sick, the kids want to send a message back to his home planet in the hope that they can save him, but Courtney is not in favour of the plan. (S3 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Quiche it Goodbye: When an 'evil conglomerate' is threatening to take over Chef's favourite childhood restaurant, Owen rallies the kids to take them down. (S3 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ice Guys Finish Last: Chef brings a souvenir iceberg home from a trip to the South Pole and Duncan finds a prehistoric surprise inside. (S3 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 1: When Chef discovers his spooky Halloween pranks have never scared the kids, he's devastated, and agrees to hand over full control of his pranking to Gwen. (S3 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 2: Gwen's plan turns out far spookier than Chef ever hoped. (S3 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Treasure Bear: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Lemmings!: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Flower Power: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzy's adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Countdown: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Airlines: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his snack by a strange flow of objects that have been transformed into hot air balloons. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Us 'r' Toys: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dude Where's Macaw: While trying to defend his elite gamer status, Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Manufacturing Secret: Grizzy has run out of chocolate spread. He realises that the Lemmings are making their own. If they can make it, then why can't he? But first, he needs the recipe! (S1 Ep43)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Intellectual Bear: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his head, Grizzy is transformed into a being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Abaracaduncan: When a magic trick goes sideways, Duncan makes a great escape and Harold becomes the target of a Sorcerer Hunt! (S2 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Shock & Aww: When Courtney gets the old, gross daycare carpet replaced with a new one, the resulting static electricity has unexpected consequences. (S2 Ep51)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: A Song of Ice and Fire Noodles: When Gwen loses her ice powers from eating spicy ramen, she takes desperate measures to get them back. (S1 Ep109)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: Ravenzella's Revenge: As the academy teachers gear up to battle a powerful foe, they forbid their students from leaving the dorms. But one rider doesn't follow the rules. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: A Big Baby: Felicity and Miguel babysit a baby giant but things quickly escalate out of control. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Mythic Macaroons: Felicity's Mythic Mounties troop sells cookies to raise money so they can save their favourite park. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: As You Squish: A town of seahorses mistake Squishella as their fabled hero, but rather than correcting them, she embraces the role. (S1 Ep110)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: Mended Hearts: Without the help of their teachers, the students must work together to take on the evil Ravenzella all by themselves. Unicorn Academy depends on it! (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Winky: Felicity is overwhelmed by the responsibility of owning her first pet, a cute but mischievous creature called a Winky. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Trivial Per Hoot: Athena loses her confidence when, for the first time ever, she gets a fact about Mythlandia wrong. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The A-bok-bok-bokalypse: When chicken pox sweeps through the school, the kids visit the Chicken Queen to apologise for past misdeeds and hopefully procure an antidote before it's too late! (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pinata Regatta: Izzy can't bring herself to smash a pinata during Cinco de Mayo celebrations. But when that unsmashed pinata comes to life and spawns an evil pinata army, it's batter up. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dame-gerous Game: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a hide and seek contest, they're trapped on a private island by a jealous ex-champion and forced to play for their freedom. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: He Who Wears The Clown: After trying on the nose of a clown, Owen learns that this is how clowns are made. He's stuck as a clown until he can trick someone into asking to try on the nose. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Melyn yn anghofus iawn heddiw. Sut y daw hi o hyd i'r holl bethau mae wedi eu colli? Baba Melyn (Baba Yellow) is very forgetful today. How will she find all the things she's lost?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae Lwsi'n ymweld â theulu sy'n addysgu eu plant gartre, a'r gwersi yn cynnwys dysgu am wenyn, mêl, a gwneud cloc haul. On Newffion today Lwsi visits a family that home-teach their children.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth yw'r holl bethau ar y bwrdd? Papur, glud a rhubanau. Gyda rhain, mae Seren yn dysgu am origami, mae'r Capten yn dysgu am y glud a Fflwff yn creu hunan-bortread. Seren learns origami!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn tywys Betsan ar antur i Fferm Fach i ddod o hyd i arlleg fel bod hi'n gallu pobi bara garlleg. Hywel and Betsan seek garlic so that she can bake garlic bread.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn mwynhau diwrnod allan yn y goedwig! When one of Huwcyn's prized possessions gets lost, the friends must help him find it.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Meg yn gofyn 'Pam bod cymylau gyda ni?' Mae Tad-cu'n ateb efo stori am ei Ddad-cu e, oedd yn hedfan cymylau'r byd i achub anifeiliaid! Today, Meg asks 'What are clouds for?'

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn cyfeiriannu ym Mharc Craig y Nos, ac fe fydd Alys a'i ffrind Mila yn gwersylla. Today, Huw and Elan will be surfing in Caswell Bay.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu, a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Lon Las, Swansea, to create a treasure.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn falch iawn o'i hamog newydd ond yn gwrthod gadael i'w ffrindiau gael tro ynddo. Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Dyw Deian ddim yn deall pam fasa Loli eisiau treulio amser ar ei phen ei hun yn darllen yn lle chwara! Deian doesn't understand why Loli wants to spend time alone reading, and not playing.

programme.title: New: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Twm Twrch heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Twm Twrch's world today?

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical adventure as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Rhaglen sy'n datgelu rhai o gyfrinachau'r blaned fwyaf yn ein system solar - Y Blaned Iau. The secrets of the planet Jupiter and how every living thing exists because of it.

programme.title: Guinness World Records Cymru 2025
programme.desc: Ymdrechion i dorri recordiau Guinness World Records Cymru 2025: menywod cryf yn tynnu Injan, blodau diri, raff trapeze, a mwy! We follow attempts to break Guinness World Records Cymru 2025.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Ry' ni yn Sir Fôn yn trefnu priodas Meg a Luke. Ma gan Luke, efo help Trystan, rywbeth fyny ei lawes sy'n rhoi dipyn o sioc i Emma a Meg! We're in Anglesey organising Meg and Luke's wedding.

programme.title: Ty Ffit
programme.desc: Mae'r chwaraewr rygbi byd-enwog Shane Williams yn treulio amser yn 'Ty Ffit' penwythnos yma. World-famous rugby player Shane Williams spends time with the five in the house this weekend.

programme.title: 3 Lle: Ffion Dafis
programme.desc: Ffion Dafis sy'n ein tywys i 3 lleoliad o'i dewis: Dolwyddelan, glannau'r Fenai a'r A470. Ffion Dafis takes us to Dolwyddelan, the Menai Straits and along the infamous A470.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Wrth grwydro ei filltir sgwâr daw'r awdur Harri Parri i ddargnafod rhai o straeon mwyaf arswydus Pen Llyn. As he explores the Llyn Peninsula, Harri Parri discovers the area's scary stories.

programme.title: Byd Eithafol Neo-Nazis yn Ein Plith
programme.desc: Y newyddiadurwr Maxine Hughes sy'n ymchwilio i'r bechgyn Cymraeg sy'n cael eu radicaleiddio gan neo-Nazis. We look into the number of teenage boys being groomed and radicalised by neo-Nazis.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn â thair cenhedlaeth sy'n troi'r tir ar fferm fynydd Defaidty yng Nghwmtirmynach Bala. We meet 3 generations of the same family who farm the land at Defaidty, Cwmtirmynach, Bala

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With onscreen English subtitles.

programme.title: Sgorio: Caerdydd v Llansawel
programme.desc: Gêm fyw o Brif Adran Genero yn Stadiwm Dinas Caerdydd gyda Chaerdydd v Llansawel. C/G 17.00. Live Genero Adran Premier football match with Cardiff v Briton Ferry Llansawel. K/O 17.00.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlwn Sul y Blodau gan ddysgu am draddodiadau Cymreig yr wyl. We celebrate Palm Sunday in Montgomeryshire; hymns from Capel y Tabernacl, Llanfyllin, and a performance by Siwan Henderson.

programme.title: New: Cynefin
programme.desc: Bydd Heledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn cyrraedd Bro Dysynni - ardal sy'n cuddio tu ôl i lethrau mynydd Cadair Idris rhwng Machynlleth a Dolgellau. We discover more about beautiful Bro Dysynni.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Ail gyfres. Wrth i Barry geisio cadw rheolaeth ar y wing, mae dyfodiad aelodau staff newydd yn gwneud bywyd yn anodd. Second series. Barry tries to keep control of the wing against all odds.

programme.title: Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i chwerthin a chrio a dadlau dros deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back on the sofa!

programme.title: New: Molly Palmer: Endo a Fi
programme.desc: Mae'r DJ a'r cyflwynydd Molly Palmer, sy'n dioddef o endo, yn darganfod mwy am y salwch hwn - y diagnosis, y driniaeth, a mwy. DJ & presenter Molly Palmer finds out more about endometriosis.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Llangeitho sy'n cael sylw tro ma, a chaiff y Welsh Whisperer glywed hanes Daniel Rowland a thwf y Methodistiaid yng Nghymru. We're in Llangeitho, meeting local historian Dafydd Iolo Jones.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Sut mae Anni'n bwriadu cael gwared ar y bananas ych a fi mae Mam-Gu wedi roi yn ei bocs bwyd? How will Anni get rid of the yucky bananas that Mam-gu's put in her lunchbox?

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae pawb wrth eu bodd heddiw gan fod parti ar y traeth - pawb heblaw Lisa Lân. Everyone is excited to go to a beach party today, everyone except Lisa Lân.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Mae sioe dalent Mici Afal wedi cyrraedd Cwm Doniol ac mae'r Doniolis yn benderfynol o ennill. Mici Afal brings his talent contest to Cwm Doniol and the Doniolis are determined to win.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn chwarae offerynnau ac yn profi henaint! The crew play instruments and experience old age!

programme.title: New: LEGO® DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Mae Beth Bythoedd yn creu bwystfil dyblyg i drechu'r Cwsgarwyr unwaith ac am byth. Beth Bythoedd creates a doppel monster to eliminate the dream chasers once and for all.

programme.title: Mabinogiogi a Mwy
programme.desc: Fersiwn criw Stwnsh o hanes nawddsant Cymru, Dewi Sant, gyda digon o chwerthin, canu, dawnsio, rapio ac ambell i wyrth! The Stwnsh team's version of patron saint, Saint David's story.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Gyda'r tyllau yn llawn dop o rai bach, mae'n amser wynebu realiti bywyd tu allan. The burrows are overflowing with young. How do the animals cope with overcrowding and predation?

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Gwenno'n teimlo'n ofnadwy. Pam fuodd hi mor wirion ag yfed gymaint a gweiddi'n gâs ar Elen? Gwenno feels awful. Why was she so stupid as to shout at Elen?

programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.desc: Cyfres goginio newydd gyda Colleen Ramsey. Tro hwn, mae hi'n dangos i ni sut all un ryseit blasus greu opsiynau eraill mewn wythnos brysur. A brand new cookery series with Colleen Ramsey.
